commit message: Switched to the FAB from the support libraries
Added circular reveal/hide effect to the FeedActivity
Added a simple UI for individual podcast settings
Added a setting bitmask to the Subscription database for individual podcast settings
Added basic infrastructure for handling pr podcast settings
Replaced Fresco with Glide some critical places in the code. This helped a lot on the memory issues
Minor UI changes to the the FeedActivity
Implemented podcast sort order in the FeedActivity
